text: Came to this coffee shop to eat the mookata. It's a decent and pretty standard coffee shop. It has a wide variety of stalls. Interestingly enough, there were quite a few beer ladies around, way more than usual. When we sat down they came to ask if we wanted to order beer and did it several times too, very enthusiastic.
A very nice kopitiam with good variety of stalls. They have Chinese food, zi char, mookata,  western and others. The kopitam is well maintained, brightly lit. Easy to find seats. Recommend it.

A real Ipoh-taste and lots of free crispy lard food with very reasonable price! Enjoy the food to the max! 😋
Also, the boss is super nice that helped me to find out my “losing” laptop that left behind! 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

Went and try their $2 coffee toast set. Encounter a very rude coffee stall uncle. Service is very poor, and bread very normal. Could go boon keng hawker for $3. Better service, egg is open for you... 😜

I have tried most of the food already I can say they are ok for the price but the breakfast set is damn worth. $2 for breakfast with a drink?!?! Anyday my guy. Idk how long this will last but it's hella good deal for the time being.
